content: Ember has a "Staged RFC RFC" nearing completion, might be worth a read.
One thing I particularly like is distinguishing stable from recommended
I think this would make sense for Rust too
It helps to avoid that "document before you stabilize" problem where you dont' want to document unstable things but you don't want to stabilize and never document
This looks great, especially how it takes on a process that already seems to work well in standards work.
